Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Learn how Cisco collaboration devices and Microsoft Teams combine to deliver smarter, AI-driven collaboration in your workspaces. We'll highlight how to improve workplace efficiency and employee engagement by integrating advanced AI capabilities with Cisco's intuitive collaboration devices. Experience how these tools create a seamless experience for employees, whether working in the office or remotely, and why this integration is a game-changer for today's work.
